bio.p: Quan‚ÄêHong Yang joined Tianjin University as a full professor in 2006 and became a chair professor in the same university in 2016. His research focuses on novel functional carbon materials with the applications in energy and environmental issues. Specifically, he has made significant advances in high volumetric performance EES devices and the conversion of air pollutants into energy storage materials. See https://nanoyang.tju.edu.cn for more details about the Nanoyang Group.
